/usr/bin/g++ CMakeFiles/harness_exe.dir/harness.cu.o CMakeFiles/harness_exe.dir/kernels/simple_kernel.cu.o CMakeFiles/harness_exe.dir/cmake_device_link.o -o harness_exe  -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread -ldl  -L"/usr/local/cuda/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/stubs" -L"/usr/local/cuda/targets/x86_64-linux/lib"
